title: French partridge in a bread blanket, butternut crush and Brussels sprouts
description: Savor the essence of autumn with this deliciously dainty partridge recipe.Equipment and preparation: You’ll need a pasta machine.
ingredients: 1 clove baked garlic, peeled and puréed
1tsp potato flour, mix with a few drops of water before adding to the sauce to thicken
1 butternut squash, cut in half, seeds removed, scored
